pt.ist.fenixframework.backend.jvstm.repository

Class LockFreeRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • pt.ist.fenixframework.backend.jvstm.repository.LockFreeRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExtendedRepository, Repository

    public class LockFreeRepository
extends Object
implements ExtendedRepository
    This class implements the Repository interface using a pluggable dataGrid. It extends the Repository with additional methods.

      • getMaxCounterForClass

        public int getMaxCounterForClass(DomainClassInfo domainClassInfo)
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Returns the counter stored for a given domain class.
        Specified by:
        getMaxCounterForClass in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        domainClassInfo - The information about the class for which the required counter refers.
        Returns:
        The (non negative) counter value stored for the given domain class or a negative value if there is no stored information regarding this class's counter.

      • updateMaxCounterForClass

        public void updateMaxCounterForClass(DomainClassInfo domainClassInfo,
                            int newCounterValue)
        Description copied from interface: Repository
        Invoked by the framework whenever a new OID is generated (i.e. a new DomainObject is created inside a transaction). Depending on the concrete repository, this may be needed for maintaining the maximum id per class (and maybe per server).
        Specified by:
        updateMaxCounterForClass in interface Repository
        Parameters:
        domainClassInfo - Information about the instantiated class
        newCounterValue - The new value of the counter

      • getCommitIdFromVersion

        public String getCommitIdFromVersion(int txVersion)
        Description copied from interface: ExtendedRepository
        Get the String representation of the commitId belonging to the given version.
        Specified by:
        getCommitIdFromVersion in interface ExtendedRepository
        Parameters:
        txVersion - The version from which to get the commit id
        Returns:
        The commitId or null if the requested version is not committed yet

      • replaceTail

        protected void replaceTail(VBox box,
               jvstm.VBoxBody body,
               jvstm.VBoxBody tail)
        Replace the reference to VBox#NOT_LOADED_BODY with a reference to the given tail. This method will only succeed when replacing references to null or VBox#NOT_LOADED_BODY with some other tail.
        Parameters:
        body - The body whose tail we need to replace. If it is null then, replace this VBox's body instead.
        tail - The reference to replace. Should end with VBox#NOT_LOADED_BODY (this method does not check for it).

      • replaceBodyValue

                    Object value)
